mapper.sql: id, content, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, status, introduct_img
mapper.select: select a.content as introduction,b.image_path as img from introduct a,workimages b where a.introduct_img =b.image_id and a.id = 1
mapper.insert: insert into introduct (id, content, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, status, introduct_img) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introductImg,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
content,

last_modify_time,

introduct_img,

mapper.update:
update introduct
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduct_img = #{introductImg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
